# idsst.rtutorials

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`idsst.rtutorials` contains the R tutorials

+ bar-charts
+ boxplots
+ cusomize
+ deriving
+ exploratory-data-analysis
+ histograms
+ isolating
+ line-graphs
+ overplotting
+ programming-basics
+ scatterplots
+ tibbles
+ visualization-basics


## Installation

You can install the development version of idsst.rtutorials from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hgstp/idsst.rtutorials")
```
